dct_title_s: Map of the United States in North America : with the British, French and Spanish dominions adjoining, according to the treaty of 1783
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. "May 1, 1783." Prime meridian: Ferro. From: A philosophical and political history of the settlements and trade of the Europeans in the East and West Indies / revised, augmented, and published in ten volumes, by the Abbé Raynal ... London : Printed for W. Strahan; and T. Cadell, 1783.
rights_statement_s:
No Known Copyright
